text: Weimar is a city in the middle of Germany, in the state of Thuringia. About 60,000 people live there. It has a university. Most famous citizens in the past were the German poets Johann Wolfgang von Goethe and Friedrich Schiller. The city is well known for the Weimar Republic. It was founded in Weimar in 1919. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Cities in Thuringia Category:Urban Districts of Thuringia Category:Weimar Republic
title: Weimar
